mutants.original_line: return [word for word in words if re.search("^" + char, word)]
mutants.mutated_line: return [word for word in words if re.search('^' - char, word)]

mutants.original_line: return [word for word in words if re.search("^" + char, word)]
mutants.mutated_line: return [word for word in words if re.search('^' * char, word)]

mutants.original_line: return [word for word in words if re.search("^" + char, word)]
mutants.mutated_line: return [word for word in words if re.search('' + char, word)]
